name: Real Car Racer
description:
Real Car Racing mobile racing game – you have to play it to believe it.

New generation of car racing games 3d. Race and drift in a big city highway, zooming around curves and between lanes along with top racers!

Get behind the wheel and smoke your challengers. Its all about who crosses the finish line first.
So you think, you have what it takes to be the Street King

Features

Amazing Super Cars
Adventures Racing Track
Realistic Controls
Vehicle Customization
NOS
Speed

"Keep the fun in the Game and drive safe"

Gamebread "live to play"

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
